rows.label: tlk70000014_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Welcome, travelers. Have you been
enjoying some of the Iiran sights?

rows.label: tlk70000014_01_msg0002
rows.name:
There's plenty to see in the residential
ward. There's a range of merchants, and
the artisans have their workshops there.

rows.label: tlk70000014_01_msg0003
rows.name:
But of course, the main tourist
spot in town is Aurium Palace,
where the king of Iira lives.

rows.label: tlk70000014_01_msg0004
rows.name:
I didn't know this before
I moved here, but...

rows.label: tlk70000014_01_msg0005
rows.name:
The royal palace is so huge in part
because it also houses workshops for
renowned engineers and craftspeople.

rows.label: tlk70000014_01_msg0006
rows.name:
Most people aren't actually
allowed to see the workshops,
but I bet they're magnificent.
